cards.name: Bludger
effect: Before each of your turns, Bludger does 3 damage to your opponent if a Match is in play. (If there isn't a Match in play, Bludger does no damage).

cards.name: Catch the Snitch
cards.flavorText: 'Harry had suddenly gone into a spectacular dive, which drew gasps and cheers from the crowd.'
effect: You win the current Match. (You get the prize.)

cards.name: Charms Exam
cards.flavorText: 'Professor Flitwick called them one by one into his class to see if they could make a pineapple tap-dance across a desk.'
effect: Your opponent discards his or her hand. Then he or she may draw any number of cards.

cards.name: Fluffy
cards.flavorText: 'As the door creaked, low, rumbling growls met their ears. All three of the dog's noses sniffed madly in their direction...'
effect: To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.

cards.name: Fred & George Weasley
effect: You may use 1 Action (instead of 2) to put an Adventure card from your hand into play, even if you already have one in play. If you already had one in play, discard the old one. (Nobody gets the reward.)

cards.name: Gaze Into the Mirror
cards.flavorText: 'Harry was so close to the mirror now that his nose was nearly touching that of his reflection. 'Mum?' he whispered. 'Dad?''
effect: During your opponent's turns, prevent all damage done to you by Spell cards.
to solve: Your opponent chooses 5 Spell cards in his or her hand and discards them.
reward: Your opponent gets 1 more Action (the turn this Adventure is solved).
cards.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 5 Spell cards in his or her hand and discards them.
cards.reward: Your opponent gets 1 more Action (the turn this Adventure is solved).

cards.name: Gold Cauldron
effect: To play this card, return 2 of your Potions Lessons from play to your hand.

cards.name: Golden Snitch
effect: At the end of your opponent's turn, you win the game unless your opponent has at least 10 more cards in his or her deck than you do. (If he or she does, your opponent wins the game instead.)

cards.name: Hagrid Needs Help
effect: Your opponent gets 1 fewer Action on each of his or her turns (even the turn this Adventure is solved). (If this would mean your opponent has fewer than 1 Action, he or she still gets 1 Action.)
to solve: Your opponent takes 8 damage.
reward: Your opponent may draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Halloween Feast
cards.flavorText: 'A thousand live bats fluttered from the walls and ceilings while a thousand more swooped over the tables in low black clouds, making the candles in the pumpkins stutter.'
effect: Put up to 4 Creature cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Harry the Seeker
cards.flavorText: 'Harry saw it. In a great rush of excitement he dived downwards after the streak of gold.'
effect: Once during each of your turns, when you use an Action to play a Quidditch Lesson card, you may also draw a card.

cards.name: Hospital Bed
effect: You may use an Action to search your deck. You may take a Healing card, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Madam Rolanda Hooch
cards.flavorText: 'Their teacher, Madam Hooch, arrived. She had short, grey hair and yellow eyes like a hawk.'
effect: Once per game, you may search your deck. When you do, you may take a Broom card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Marcus Flint
cards.flavorText: '... Slytherin captain Marcus Flint gains the Quaffle and off he goes — Flint flying like an eagle up there...' - Lee Jordan, Commentator
effect: Once per game, you may make your opponent choose 3 cards in his or her hand and discard them. (If there are fewer than 3 cards in your opponent's hand, he or she discards them all.)

cards.name: Neville Longbottom
cards.flavorText: 'Neville went bright red but turned in his seat to face Malfoy. 'I'm worth twelve of you, Malfoy,' he stammered.'
effect: You may prevent all but the first 8 damage done to you each turn.

cards.name: Nimbus Two Thousand
effect: Whenever 1 of your Item or Spell cards that needs Quidditch Power does damage, it does 2 more damage. If you play this card and already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

cards.name: No Time to Play
effect: Discard all Matches and Items that need Quidditch Power from play (even your own). (If a Match is discarded, no one gets the prize.)

cards.name: Oliver Wood
cards.flavorText: 'That Quidditch Cup'll have our name on it this year,' said Wood happily as they drudged back up to the castle.'
effect: Once per game, when 1 of your Spell cards that needs Quidditch Power does damage, you may have it do 8 more damage.

cards.name: Out of Control
effect: Do 6 damage to your opponent. Then your opponent chooses 4 cards in his or her hand and discards them. (If there are fewer than 4 cards in your opponent's hand, he or she discards them all.)

cards.name: Potions Class Disaster
effect: Your opponent chooses 5 of his or her cards and discards them. Those cards can come from his or her hand or from play or from both. (If there are fewer than 5 total cards in your opponent's hand and in play, he or she discards them all.)

cards.name: Prof. Minerva McGonagall
effect: Once per game, you may discard the Adventure your opponent has played. (You don't get the reward.)

cards.name: Put-Outer
effect: You may use 2 Actions to choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and return it to his or her hand.

cards.name: Ravenclaw Match
effect: to win: Do 10 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
prize: The winner searches his or her deck. He or she may take up to 2 Lesson cards from his or her deck and put them into play. Then that player shuffles his or her deck.
cards.toWin: Do 10 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
cards.prize: The winner searches his or her deck. He or she may take up to 2 Lesson cards from his or her deck and put them into play. Then that player shuffles his or her deck.

cards.name: Scabbers
cards.flavorText: 'The rat was still snoozing on Ron's lap. 'He might have died and you wouldn't know the difference,' said Ron in disgust.'
effect: If Scabbers is discarded from play during your opponent's turn, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Seamus Finnigan
cards.flavorText: ''Finnigan, Seamus', the sandy-haired boy next to Harry in the line, sat on the stool for almost a whole minute before the hat declared him a Gryffindor.'
effect: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 2 cards from your hand to get 1 more Action.

cards.name: Slytherin Match
effect: to win: Do 15 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
prize: The winner may shuffle up to 15 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile into his or her deck.
cards.toWin: Do 15 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
cards.prize: The winner may shuffle up to 15 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

cards.name: Start-of-Term Feast
effect: Put up to 4 Lesson cards from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Support Banner
effect: At the end of your turn, draw a card if you played at least 1 Spell card that needs Quidditch Power that turn.

cards.name: The Sorting Hat
effect: You may use 2 Actions to search your deck. You may take a Character card of a Character that isn't already in play and put it in play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Trevor
cards.flavorText: 'When they shook their heads, he wailed, 'I've lost him! He keeps getting away from me!'' - Neville Longbottom
effect: When you play this card, you may put a Lesson card from your discard pile into your hand. Whenever a Spell card damages you, you may let Trevor take that damage instead.

cards.name: Chocolate Frogs
cards.flavorText: ''What are those?' Harry asked Ron, holding up a pack of Chocolate Frogs. 'They're not really frogs, are they?''
effect: Search your deck. You may take a Wizard or a Witch card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Comet Two Sixty
effect: Once during each of your opponent's turns, you may prevent 1 damage done to you. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

cards.name: Defence!
effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you.

cards.name: Devil's Snare
cards.flavorText: 'As for Harry and Ron, their legs had already been bound tightly in long creepers without their noticing.'
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. At the end of each of your turns, remove all damage counters from Devil's Snare.

cards.name: Diffindo
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character). Your opponent discards that card.

cards.name: Doxy
effect: When you play this card, you may choose another Creature in play. Do 2 damage to it.

cards.name: Hufflepuff Match
cards.flavorText: 'Up in the air, Snape turned on his broomstick just in time to see something scarlet shoot past him, missing him by inches...'
effect: to win: Do 8 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
prize: The winner may draw 5 cards. The loser takes 5 damage.
cards.toWin: Do 8 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
cards.prize: The winner may draw 5 cards. The loser takes 5 damage.

cards.name: In the Stands
cards.flavorText: 'It took perhaps thirty seconds for Snape to realise that he was on fire.'
effect: Your opponent can't play Creature cards.
to solve: Your opponent chooses 4 Creature cards in his or her hand and discards them.
reward: Your opponent may draw a card.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 Creature cards in his or her hand and discards them.
cards.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.name: Into the Forbidden Forest
cards.flavorText: 'They walked in silence, their eyes on the ground. Every now and then a ray of moonlight through the branches above lit a spot of silver blue blood on the fallen leaves.'
effect: Whenever 1 of your Creatures does damage to your opponent, it does 1 more damage.
to solve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
reward: Your opponent may draw a card.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
cards.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.name: Jawbind Potion
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't play Spell cards.

cards.name: Missing Parchment
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any Spell cards there, choose 1 of them and discard it.

cards.name: Penalty Shot
effect: Draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Pep Talk
cards.flavorText: 'Don't want to pressure you, Potter, but if we ever need an early capture of the Snitch it's now.' - Oliver Wood
effect: The first Action your opponent uses on each of his or her turns must be used to draw a card.
to solve: Your opponent shows you a card from his or her hand with a (printed) Power needed of 8 or more.
reward: Your opponent may draw 2 cards.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent shows you a card from his or her hand with a (printed) Power needed of 8 or more.

cards.name: Petrificus Totalus
effect: Choose 1 of either player's Creatures in play and a Lesson card in that player's discard pile. Discard that Creature and put that Lesson card into play.

cards.name: Power Play
effect: Play this card only if a Match is in play. Do 7 damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Race for the Snitch
cards.flavorText: 'Harry was faster than Higgs - he could see the little round ball, wings fluttering, darting up ahead..'
effect: Your opponent discards the card he or she draws at the start of each of his or her turns.
to solve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
reward: You discard your hand.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.

cards.name: Snape's Bias
cards.flavorText: 'Ron didn't answer; Snape had just awarded Hufflepuff a penalty because George Weasley had hit a Bludger at him.'
effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to draw cards.
to solve: Your opponent lets you search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
reward: Your opponent may draw a card.
cards.toSolve: Your opponent lets you search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.name: Sticking Up for Neville
cards.flavorText: 'He turned his broomstick sharply to face Malfoy in mid-air. Malfoy looked stunned.'
effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 4 damage.
to solve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
reward: Your opponent may put up to 4 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile on the bottom of his or her deck (in any order).
cards.toSolve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
cards.reward: Your opponent may put up to 4 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile on the bottom of his or her deck (in any order).

cards.name: Strategy Session
effect: You may put up to 3 Quidditch Lessons from your hand into play.

cards.name: Weakness Potion
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 5 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you by your opponent's Creatures.

cards.name: Bloodroot Poison
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 4 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

cards.name: Bravado
effect: For the rest of this turn, your Spell cards need 5 less Power to play. (You still need at least 1 Power that Matches.)

cards.name: Bruisewort Balm
effect: Shuffle up to 5 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

cards.name: Cleansweep Seven
effect: When you play this card, look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put them back on top in any order. (If there are fewer than 4, look at all of them.) If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

cards.name: Cobbing
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in play, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards them.

cards.name: Cobra Lily
effect: At the end of each of your turns, remove all damage counters from Cobra Lily.

cards.name: Desk Into Pig
cards.flavorText: 'Then she changed her desk into a pig and back again.'
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. Search your deck. You may take up to 3 Creature cards from your deck, show them to your opponent and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Drowsiness Draught
effect: Do 3 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't use Actions to play Lesson cards.

cards.name: Fouled!
cards.flavorText: ''WHAM!' A roar of rage echoed from the Gryffindors below - Marcus Flint had blocked Harry on purpose and Harry's broom span off course, Harry holding on for dear life.'
effect: Do 4 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she gets 1 fewer Action. (If this would mean your opponent has fewer than 1 Action, he or she still gets 1 Action.)

cards.name: Gone!
effect: Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any Creature cards there, choose 1 of them and discard it.

cards.name: Mice to Snuffboxes
effect: Choose up to 2 Creatures in play and return them to their owners' hands.

cards.name: Mopsus Potion
effect: Do 3 damage to yout opponent or to a Creature of your choice.

cards.name: Ouch!
effect: Do 5 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in his or her hand, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards it.

cards.name: Practice Match
effect: to win: Do 5 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
prize: The winner may draw 4 cards.
cards.toWin: Do 5 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)

cards.name: Pulling Up
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent. Then draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Research
cards.flavorText: 'And then, of course, there was the sheer size of the library; tens of thousands of books, thousands of shelves, hundreds of narrow rows.'
effect: To play this card, discard 1 of your Lessons from play. Search your deck. You may put up to 2 Lesson cards from your deck into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Rope Bind
effect: Do 2 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice. Then draw a card.

cards.name: Searching for the Snitch
cards.flavorText: 'Way up above them, Harry was gliding over the game, squinting about for some sign of the Snitch.'
effect: Search your deck. You may take a Quidditch Lesson or a card that needs Quidditch Power from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Smash!
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items in play and discard it.

cards.name: Stream of Flames
effect: Do 3 damage to your opponent. You may also choose a Creature in play and do 3 damage to it.

cards.name: Streeler
effect: When you play this card, you may choose another Creature in play. Do 1 damage to it.

cards.name: Swarm!
effect: Count the number of Creatures in play (yours and your opponent's). Do that much damage to your opponent.

cards.name: Time Out
cards.flavorText: 'Shut up, you two,' said Wood. 'This is the best team Gryffindor's had in years. We're going to win. I know it.'
effect: Look at the top 6 cards of your deck and put them back on top in any order. (If there are fewer than 6, look at all of them.)

cards.name: Vanish
effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's Creatures or Characters in play (other than his or her starting Character) and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.
